summary: The Portal for Appraisal Licensing Act of 2025 amends the Financial Institutions Reform, Recovery, and Enforcement Act of 1989. It mandates the establishment of a cloud-based Portal for Appraiser Credentialing and AMC Registration Information. The Portal will streamline application and renewal processes, connect with state agencies, and facilitate fee payments. The bill addresses background checks, education course information, and unique identifiers. It also establishes an advisory committee and allows for user fees to fund the Portal's operation.
